resources.string:
" # the general section is required for any configuration [general] stationCount=(number of stations (max is 15, start with 1)) ftpServerCount=(number of ftp servers (start with 1)
#UNCOMMENT AND COPY THE FOLLOWING SECTIONS AS NEEDED
# for stationCount number the following section must be repeatet # change the number in the section 1,2,3,.. #[station_1] #name=(name to appear on the button in UI, keep it short) #url=(streaming url) #user=(user name, if login is required, otherwise put in the user key) #pass=(password, ..) #slot=(button 1..15 to assign this station to, don't assign 2 stations to same button) #mediaType=0 - HLS, 1 - RTSP - use 0 unless it is RTSP
# for each FTP server a copy of the following section is needed # change the number in the section 1,2,3,.. #[ftp_1] #name=(name to appear in UI, keep it short) #host=(URL of FTP Server) #user=(user name for logon) #pass=(password, ..) #initialDir=(directory to change to after login)
"
